title: MS STUCK
body: After they disabled rank Q's for connection issues. Ive been getting 120-144ms, Usually get 39ms. It doesnt even fluctuate what is wrong ?

replies.body:
Whenever your ping starts spiking up really high, it could mean that your network is having some issues communicating with our servers. When you have an unstable connection, it can cause you to have really high ping while you network tries to catch up with our server. Follow our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be able to get a more solid connection.

Let me know if you've got any questions.
